properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 7 at 10:03AM CST until January 8 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
* WINDS AND WAVES...Northwest winds gusting to 35 mph are
expected to build waves to 7 to 10 feet and occasionally to 13
feet along the Porter County shore.

* TIMING...Midnight tonight through Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...The increased wave action, combined with ongoing
shoreline erosion may result in additional flooding along the
Porter County lakeshore. The water may threaten some roads
near the lake, including Lakefront Drive in the Beverly Shores
area.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will
generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY
